title: Aside P is thrice as good a workman as Q and together they finish a piece of work in 14 days. What is the number of days taken by P alone to finish the work? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let P alone take x days Then Q alone takes 3x days Together in 1 day they do 1/x +1/3x = 1/14 42 + 14 = 3x 3x = 56 x= 18.67 days ANSWER
